sentences: Ma olen uskunud, et see on hea mõte.
Ta on uskunud, et tema lapsevanemad on õiged.
Nende uskunud liikmed osalevad sageli kirikuteenistustel.
context: The word 'uskunud' is the past tense of the Estonian verb 'uskmama', which means to believe or think something. It is commonly used in sentences to express that someone has believed or thought something in the past.
